long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The extension connects to ipinfo.com and retrieves the free information about your own ip address. It then parses it and displays it for you to see. This will be helpful for you to understand if you are on a VPN or not for example. It will also show the security conscious user information about what information they are showing sites that they visit. This will save time for people who need to do this repetitively.
